Apologizes to Mantosh for earlier behavior, attempts to reconnect sincerely.
Expresses empathy by acknowledging Mantosh's pain and shared loss of their mother.
Challenges Mantosh's perspective on 'luck' with a thoughtful argument about his own experience.
Attempts to emotionally reconnect with Mantosh by apologizing and engaging in a heartfelt conversation.
Shows self-awareness and resilience by acknowledging the role of luck but emphasizing perseverance and agency.
Struggles with Mantosh’s perspective but maintains empathy and tries to guide the conversation constructively.
Expresses concern for his brother Mantosh, emphasizing the importance of keeping the family together.
Reluctantly joins Mantosh in dancing, sharing a goofy, joyful moment and laughter.
Gently and carefully places a Ganesh medallion in his brother’s hand while he sleeps, showing tenderness and care.
Expresses emotional support and commitment to keeping family together despite difficulties.
Participates in lighthearted, spontaneous dancing with brother to uplift spirits.
Carefully places Ganesh medallion in Mantosh’s hand, showing thoughtfulness and sensitivity.
Shares a locked stare with Guddu, showing vulnerability and emotional openness before diving into cold water as a release of grief and anger.
Deliberately ruins his painstaking research and search efforts, signaling resignation but also an acceptance of limits and an honest emotional surrender.
Divides focus from the freezing cold to dive into the water despite pain, showing physical and emotional endurance.
Roars out grief and anger loudly, using emotional expression to confront internal struggles.
Deliberately ruins a year or two of painstaking map work and search material by scattering pins and tearing printouts, ending focused effort abruptly.
Accepts the end of the road with visible defeat (slumps on couch), showing resignation rather than fighting on.
Carelessly flicks the cursor on the laptop in random directions, showing detachment and exhaustion from his memories.
Flicks the trackpad carelessly and randomly, lacking clear method in searching.
Eventually notices something significant on the screen that stops him and makes him focus despite prior careless behavior.
Persistently traces train tracks on Google Earth, driven by hope to find his hometown.
Experiences vulnerability and shivers alone while revisiting memories.
Uses Google Earth to carefully and methodically trace train tracks and zoom into towns, identifying features to locate a place from memory.
Becomes more alert and focused while searching, showing determination and attention to detail.
Persists in searching on Google Earth with intense focus and determination to find a place from his past.
Reacts with vulnerability shown by looking spooked and frightened when recalling his childhood memories.
Leans in closer to the screen, touching the platform and water tower on Google Earth while working out the angles.
Scrolls frantically and rapidly across the Indian landscape on Google Earth, accurately identifying landmarks like the dam, rivers, and roads, despite some missing train tracks in the view.
Remains physically composed (sitting up straight with back ramrod straight) despite being spooked and nervous, indicating focused and controlled behavior under emotional stress.
Persistently and attentively searches on Google Earth for his childhood home despite emotional turmoil and uncertainty.
Uses Google Earth with intense focus and attention to detail, carefully matching features from memory to the map despite uncertainty.
Reacts with shock and disbelief, hands shaking and whispering town names that initially don't ring a bell, showing momentary doubt.
Scrolls through maps quickly and intently, identifying his childhood neighborhood on a blurry pixelated map using careful observation and memory.
Expresses emotional vulnerability by softly saying 'Ammi' while looking at the map, showing deep emotional connection but not affecting his task.
Knocks on the door of the house he identified and confirms with others that he found his home, showing confidence in his discovery and taking initiative.
Holds the door open as Sue walks into the room.
Admits he didn’t want Sue to feel he was ungrateful.
Watches Sue, anticipating her response with patience and sincerity.
Carries a bright orange mango to Kamla and proudly offers it to her.
Creates a detailed and methodical map of the area despite it being fractured by his earlier actions.
Shows emotional sensitivity and gratitude by reassuring Sue he was not ungrateful, indicating thoughtful communication.
Remains quietly deep in thought and alert on the plane while others sleep, demonstrating focus and self-reflection.
Repeatedly opens and closes the plane window shade once, indicating some hesitation or contemplation but controlling his impulses.
Shares playful delight with Kamla while eating mango; engages in friendly interaction.
Walks purposefully through his old neighborhood, showing deep personal connection and emotional engagement.
Lies fully clothed on bed, wide awake, showing internal restlessness but no interaction with others.
Peering intently out the taxi window, observing landscape and landmarks to orient himself.
Lies awake in hotel room but then promptly gets up to continue his search rather than wasting time.
Walks purposefully and confidently through streets, showing clear memory and navigation skills.
Approaches his childhood home cautiously, speaks politely to strangers using a photo to connect.
Returns to his childhood neighborhood and calmly approaches his old home despite emotional tension.
Uses a photo from his childhood as a visual aid to communicate with locals despite a language barrier.

Remains composed and polite when faced with confusion and unhelpful responses from the locals.

Follows the English-speaking man attentively and calmly despite uncertainty, maintaining focus.
Trusts and goes with a stranger in an unfamiliar environment based mainly on intuition and internal focus.

Observes children playing by the dam quietly and contemplatively, showing emotional maturity and self-awareness.
No indication of impulsive or reckless behavior in flashback scenes of childhood bike ride, instead showing confidence and exhilaration.
Walking closely with his brother Guddu, showing a physical closeness and comfort.
Returns to his home village after 25 years, fulfilling his mother’s hope.
Walks thoughtfully along the railway track to where his lost journey began, physically retracing his steps with intention and reflection.
Returns to Ganesh Talai after 25 years, demonstrating successful navigation and resourcefulness.
Processes the painful truth about his brother Guddu's death and the family history, showing emotional maturity.
